meanings.sent1: The vine grew helically around the tree trunk.
meanings.sent2: The tornado moved helically across the open field.
meanings.sent3: The curious squirrel climbed helically up the spiral staircase.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts spun helically in her mind, making it hard to focus.
meanings.sent5: The dancer moved helically across the stage, captivating the audience with her graceful twists.

meanings.definition: Having the shape of a helix
meanings.sent1: The DNA molecule has a helically twisted structure.
meanings.sent2: The helically designed staircase added a modern touch to the building.
meanings.sent3: The helically patterned rug gave the room a unique look.
meanings.sent4: Her hair fell in helically cascading curls down her back.
meanings.sent5: The helically shaped seashell was a rare find on the beach.
